battleTraits.name: Shriek
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: The keening wails of the Nighthaunt lodge a stake of fear within all those who hear them.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit that has not used an ****AURA OF DREAD**** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target. The number of models in the friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit must be greater than the number of models in the target unit.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Ethereal
battleTraits.lore: Nighthaunt spirits can only be harmed by blows delivered with great conviction.
battleTraits.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls (positive and negative) for friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** units, excluding **Nagash**.

battleTraits.name: Discorporate
battleTraits.lore: If given the order, the Nighthaunt can flicker between the realms of the living and dead.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Wave of Terror
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: Many foes freeze in fear when faced with a swarming Nighthaunt charge.
battleTraits.effect: Friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** units that are in combat can use ****CHARGE**** abilities this phase. However, if a unit that is in combat uses a ****CHARGE**** ability and the **charge** roll is 3 or less, that unit does not count as having charged that turn.

battleTraits.name: Petrify
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: Those who lay eyes on a spectral champion may find they are rooted in place with terror, allowing the Nighthaunt to strike them with ease.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT **HERO**** that has not used an ****AURA OF DREAD**** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Stun
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: The sight of onrushing Nighthaunt can stun enemies that do not thoroughly steel their hearts.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT **WAR MACHINE**** or ****CAVALRY**** unit that has not used an ****AURA OF DREAD**** ability this turn and that charged this turn to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Lightshard of the Harvest Moon
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This lightshard is filled with a baleful gloom that, upon release, casts the battlefield in an eerie glow, readying the enemy for the reaping.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If this unit is in combat, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

artefactsOfPower.name: Soulfire Ring
artefactsOfPower.lore: Gouts of lashing green flames leap forth from this ring as it consumes the souls of those slain by the wearer.
artefactsOfPower.effect: If any enemy models were slain by this unit’s combat attacks this turn, **Heal (D6)** this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Covetous Familiar
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a FIGHT ability for a unit in combat with this unit
artefactsOfPower.lore: This spiteful poltergeist swirls around its master’s essence, lashing out at any other soul that draws too close.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

regimentAbilities.name: Death Stalkers
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Start of the First Battle Round
regimentAbilities.lore: These spectral killers relentlessly hunt down quarry whose names have been whispered to them in darksome rites.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit on the battlefield.
regimentAbilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used for attacks that target that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Chorus of Terror
regimentAbilities.lore: Warriors are frozen in place by the shrieks of the Nighthaunt as they wash over the enemy lines in a wave of terror.
regimentAbilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target a friendly unit that charged in the same turn.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Shadow's Edge
spearheadEnhancements.lore: It is impossible to tell if this ebon blade is corporeal or mere shadow, yet its touch tears through flesh and bone with ease.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Your general’s **Sword of Stolen Hours** has **Crit (Mortal)**.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Beacon of Nagashizzar
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This malignant light summons departed souls.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Return 1 slain model to each friendly unit on the battlefield.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Soulfire Ring
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Gouts of lashing green flames leap forth from this ring as it consumes the souls of those slain by the wearer.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: If any models were slain by your general this turn, **Heal (D6)** your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Cloaked in Shadow
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Eerily intangible, this spirit’s ethereal form fades in and out of existence like some wispy cloud of supernatural mist.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: No more than 1 enemy unit can target your general with attacks (shooting or combat) per phase.

heroicTraits.name: Cloaked in Shadow
heroicTraits.lore: Eerily intangible, this spirit’s ethereal form fades in and out of existence like some wispy cloud of supernatural mist.
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for an **attack** that targets this unit is 1-3, the **attack** fails and the **attack** sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Ruler of the Spectral Hosts
heroicTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
heroicTraits.lore: The deathly power of this spirit is like a siren call, an unseen signal that beckons to others from beyond the grave.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

heroicTraits.name: Terrifying Entity
heroicTraits.lore: Some powerful spirits take a gruesome appearance or an overwhelming aura of horror to entire new heights.
heroicTraits.effect: This unit can use any of the ****AURA OF DREAD**** abilities, even if it doesn’t have the required keyword(s) for that ability.

abilities.name: Spectral Lure
abilities.lore: Embracing the chill of death, the wizard summons forth the spirits of the dead.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to D6.

abilities.name: Shademist
abilities.lore: A supernatural mist envelops the caster’s comrades, causing them to glimmer as they fade in and out of reality.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit that has 3 or more models and is wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Spirit Drain
abilities.lore: With a series of fell words of power, the caster can whittle away a mortal’s life force, causing their spirit to seep out of their physical form.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of models in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Summon Vault of Souls
abilities.lore: This summoned chest siphons souls, filling itself to overflowing with the rich spirits of mortalkind.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Vault of Souls** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Vault of Souls** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: Summon Shyish Reaper
abilities.lore: The wizard sweeps down their arm as they utter this spell’s final incantation, and a fearsome scythe formed of purest amethyst magic tears through their foes with unstoppable force.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Shyish Reaper** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Shyish Reaper** wholly within 9" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Summon Mortalis Terminexus
abilities.lore: A spectral hourglass filled with shifting grave-sand takes shape, promising temporal grace or doom to mortal and immortal alike.
abilities.declare: If there is not a friendly **Mortalis Terminexus** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Set up a **Mortalis Terminexus** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

abilities.name: Cavalcade of Death
abilities.lore: The spectral hosts march to war flanking creaking, shimmering black coaches thrumming with necrotic energy.
abilities.effect: Friendly **NIGHTHAUNT INFANTRY** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 6" of a friendly **Black Coach**.

abilities.name: Ethereal Translocation
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: The Nighthaunt appear and disappear from sight to torment their prey.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
abilities.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: There Is No Escape
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: Death Stalkers are spectral killers that relentlessly hunt down the enemy. They are constantly on the move, phasing in and out of reality as they close in on new targets.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **NIGHTHAUNT** unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the target unit can still use **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, for the rest of the turn, no mortal damage is inflicted on that unit by **RETREAT** abilities.

abilities.name: Vengeful Malison
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Those who cross the machinations of the Nighthaunt are marked for death with an unyielding curse.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy **HEROES** each within 12" of a different friendly **NIGHTHAUNT HERO** to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
